author: dildick
body:
This pull request is a clean-up of the CSC trigger customizations:
- Old cscTriggerPrimitiveDigisPostLS1_cfi has been deleted. This may cause incorrectly configured integration tests to crash
- CSC Run2 customizations are rewritten in the form of eras. The performance should not change in Run2
- GEM-CSC triggers enabled in Run3 and Phase2
- CSC-RPC trigger enabled in Phase2

@calabria @jshlee
title: Enable GEM-CSC and CSC-RPC local trigger with eras
